{
	dataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
	) {
		name
		description
        owner {
            group
        }
        datasets {
            name
            pii
            datasource {
                __typename
                ...on BigQuery {
                    projectID
                    dataset
                    table
                }
            }
        }
	}
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "name": "NewName",
      "description": "New description",
      "owner": {
        "group": "nada@nav.no"
      },
      "datasets": [{
        "name": "NewDataset",
        "pii": false,
        "datasource": {
            "__typename": "BigQuery",
            "projectID": "team-prod-4242",
            "dataset": "dataset1",
            "table": "table1"
        }
      }]
    }
  }
}
